categories: Category:Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carriers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Pursuant was a Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At some point, the cruiser-carrier flew over a land-and-water-covered terrestrial body alongside TIE/ln space superiority starfighters. The Pursuant measured 340 meters in length and was equipped with sublight engines and four hangar bays, in which it carried TIE line ships.
The Pursuant was first mentioned in the 2017 Imperial Light Carrier Expansion Pack, an expansion for the miniatures game Star Wars: Armada by Fantasy Flight Games, on a card of the same name.
